item.title: Collaborations
item.description: Groups Glasgow Parallelism Group at the University of Glasgow Functional Programming Group at the University of St Andrews People David Aspinall (University of Edinburgh) Rob Arthan (Lemma1 and Queen Mary University of London) Alan Bundy (University of Edinburgh) Paul Cockshott (University of Glasgow) Murray Cole (University of Edinburgh) Simon Colton (Imperial College) Jacques Fleuriot (University of Edinburgh) Simon Gay (University of Glasgow) Clemens Grelck, (University of Amsterdam) Kevin Hammond (University of St Andrews) Paul Jackson (University of Edinburgh) Cliff Jones (Newcastle University) Rustan Leino (Microsoft Research) Steve Linton (University of St Andrews) Colin Oâ€™Halloran (D-RisQ Software Systems and University of Oxford) Patrick Maier (University of Glasgow) Stephen Muggleton (Imperial College) Alex Shafarenko (University of Hertfordshire) Kostis Sagonas (Uppsala University) Jeremy Singer (University of Glasgow) Alan Smaill (University of Edinburgh) Simon Thompson (University of Kent) Phil Trinder (University of Glasgow) Wim Vanderbauwhede (University of Glasgow)
